verses.verse: The former <S%G4413><s%> treatise <S%G3056><s%> I made <S%G4160><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> Theophilus <S%G2321><s%>, concerning <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G756><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%>,

until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> he was received up <S%G353><s%>, after that he <S%G1781><s%> had given commandment <S%G1781><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> unto the apostles <S%G652><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he had chosen <S%G1586><s%>:

To whom <S%G3739><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> showed <S%G3936><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> passion <S%G3958><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> proofs <S%G5039><s%>, appearing <S%G3700><s%> unto <S%G1223><s%> them <S%G846><s%> by the space of forty <S%G5062><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> speaking <S%G3004><s%> the things concerning <S%G4012><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%>, being assembled together <S%G4871><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, he charged <S%G3853><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to <S%G5563><s%> depart <S%G5563><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to wait for <S%G4037><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%>, said he <S%G191><s%>, ye heard from me <S%G3450><s%>:

For <S%G3754><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> with water <S%G5204><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall be baptized <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> hence <S%G3778><s%>.

They <S%G4905><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, when they <S%G4905><s%> were come together <S%G4905><s%>, asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, dost <S%G1487><s%> thou <S%G600><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> restore the kingdom <S%G932><s%> to Israel <S%G2474><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, It <S%G1097><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> for you <S%G5216><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> times <S%G5550><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> seasons <S%G2540><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> hath set <S%G5087><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> His own <S%G2398><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> ye shall receive <S%G2983><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, when <S%G1904><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is come <S%G1904><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall be <S%G2071><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Samaria <S%G4540><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> the uttermost <S%G2078><s%> part of the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had said <S%G2036><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, as they were looking <S%G991><s%>, he <S%G846><s%> was taken up <S%G1869><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> a cloud <S%G3507><s%> received <S%G5274><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sight <S%G3788><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> while <S%G5613><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> looking stedfastly <S%G816><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> as <S%G4198><s%> he <S%G846><s%> went <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G435><s%> stood by <S%G3936><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> apparel <S%G2066><s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Ye <S%G2476><s%> men <S%G435><s%> of Galilee <S%G1057><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> stand ye <S%G2476><s%> looking <S%G1689><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>? this Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, who was received up <S%G353><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> shall <S%G2064><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> in like <S%G3739><s%> manner <S%G5158><s%> as <S%G3739><s%> ye beheld him <S%G846><s%> going <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> returned they <S%G5290><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Olivet <S%G1638><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> nigh unto Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, a <S%G2192><s%> Sabbath day <S%G4521><s%>'s journey <S%G3598><s%> off <S%G2192><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> come in <S%G1525><s%>, they went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the upper chamber <S%G5253><s%>, where <S%G3757><s%> they were abiding <S%G2650><s%>; both <S%G5037><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%>, Philip <S%G5376><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%>, Bartholomew <S%G918><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Matthew <S%G3156><s%>, James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> the Zealot <S%G2207><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> the son of James <S%G2385><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> all3956, 2258 with one accord <S%G3661><s%> continued <S%G4342><s%> stedfastly in prayer <S%G4335><s%>, 2532, 1162 with <S%G4862><s%> the women <S%G1135><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> stood up <S%G450><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the brethren <S%G3101><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> (and <S%G5037><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a <S%G846><s%> multitude of persons gathered together <S%G1909><s%>, about5613, 846 a hundred <S%G1540><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%>),

<S%G435><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%>, it was needful <S%G1163><s%> that the <S%G3778><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> should be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> spake before <S%G4277><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%>, who was <S%G1096><s%> guide <S%G3595><s%> to them that took <S%G4815><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G2674><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> numbered <S%G2674><s%> among <S%G4862><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G2975><s%> his portion <S%G2819><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%>.

(Now <S%G3767><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> obtained <S%G2932><s%> a field <S%G5564><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the reward <S%G3408><s%> of his iniquity <S%G93><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> falling <S%G1096><s%> headlong <S%G4248><s%>, he burst asunder <S%G2997><s%> in the midst <S%G3319><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%> gushed out <S%G1632><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it became <S%G1096><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the dwellers <S%G2730><s%> at Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>; insomuch <S%G5620><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> in their846, 2398 language <S%G1258><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> field <S%G5564><s%> was called <S%G2564><s%> Akeldama <S%G184><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G5564><s%>, The field of blood <S%G129><s%>.)

For <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of Psalms <S%G5568><s%>, Let <S%G1096><s%> his <S%G846><s%> habitation <S%G1886><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> made desolate <S%G2048><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G2077><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man dwell <S%G2730><s%> therein <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, His <S%G846><s%> office <S%G1984><s%> let <S%G2983><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> take <S%G2983><s%>.

Of the men <S%G435><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> have companied <S%G4905><s%> with us2254, 1722 all <S%G3956><s%> the time5550, 1722 that <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went in <S%G1525><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> among <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>,

beginning <S%G756><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%>, unto <S%G2193><s%> the <S%G3739><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he was received up <S%G353><s%> from <S%G575><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, of these <S%G5130><s%> must <S%G1096><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> a witness <S%G3144><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they put forward <S%G2476><s%> two <S%G1417><s%>, Joseph <S%G2501><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Barsabbas <S%G923><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> was surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Justus <S%G2459><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Matthias <S%G3159><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they prayed <S%G4336><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, who knowest the hearts <S%G2589><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G322><s%>, show of <S%G1537><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> the <S%G3739><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> whom thou hast chosen <S%G1586><s%>,

to take <S%G2983><s%> the place <S%G2819><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> apostleship <S%G651><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> fell <S%G3845><s%> away <S%G4198><s%>, that he might go to <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they gave1325, 846 lots <S%G2819><s%> for them <S%G2532><s%>; and the lot <S%G2819><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> Matthias <S%G3159><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he was numbered <S%G4785><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the eleven <S%G1733><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%>.
